Classes in org.xadisk.bridge.proxies.interfaces used by org.xadisk.additional
XAFileInputStream
          Represents an input stream to a file.
XAFileOutputStream

Classes in org.xadisk.bridge.proxies.interfaces used by org.xadisk.bridge.proxies.interfaces
Session
          This interface is used to invoke i/o operations on XADisk and to control the transaction associated with this session (use XADiskConnection instead of this interface when XADisk is used as a JCA Resource Adapter).
XADiskBasicIOOperations
          This interface declares a set of i/o operations which can be called on XADisk.
XADiskBasicIOOperations.PermissionType
          This enum enumerates the set of permission types required to perform read or write operations on files and directories.
XAFileInputStream
          Represents an input stream to a file.
XAFileOutputStream
          Represents an output stream to a file.
XAFileSystem
          This interface represents a reference to an XADisk instance.
